title: Introduction to shinyUHC
text: R package allows initialize UHC SALURBAL theme shiny apps.

title: Introduction to shinyUHC
text: install, load library initiate shiny app. theme shiny app template can found destination folder set. help bug report please submit issues onto repository! Happy coding ðŸ°!!
code: library(shinyUHC) ## Initialize a SALURBAL themed Shiny app initializeShinyApp(dest = "./app", theme ="SALURBAL")

title: Initialize a themed shiny app â€” initializeShinyApp
Initialize a themed shiny app â€” initializeShinyApp
code: initializeShinyApp(dest = "./", theme = "SALURBAL") #> [1] "Import: app.R" #> [1] "Import: CSS/Header.css" #> [1] "Import: CSS/Home.css" #> [1] "Import: CSS/NavbarPage.css" #> [1] "Import: HTML/FontAwesomeLoader.html" #> [1] "Import: HTML/Footer.html" #> [1] "Import: HTML/Header.html" #> [1] "Import: HTML/Home.html" #> [1] "Import: R/Modules/OldFaithful.R" #> [1] "Import: www/favicon.ico" #> [1] "Import: www/LAC_logo.png" #> [1] "Import: www/SALURBAL_logo1.jpg" #> [1] "Import: www/UHC_logo.png"
